mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure the mobile layout is optimized for larger screens and load times are minimized.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider optimizing image sizes and reducing the use of heavy JavaScript to improve load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more structured data and ensure all pages have unique and descriptive meta tags for better SEO performance.
userExperienceTip: Improve navigation by adding a search function for easier content discovery.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing unnecessary steps or offering guest checkout options.
tips: Improve image compression to reduce loading time.
Add a chatbot for enhanced customer support.
